properties.name: Key
properties.description: A key to identify the tag.

type.description: A key to identify the tag.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: Corresponding tag value for the key.

type.description: Corresponding tag value for the key.

resource.description: This resource creates a Registry for authoring schemas as part of Glue Schema Registry.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A description of the registry. If description is not provided, there will not be any default value for this.

type.description: A description of the registry. If description is not provided, there will not be any default value for this.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: Name of the registry to be created of max length of 255, and may only contain letters, numbers, hyphen, underscore, dollar sign, or hash mark.  No whitespace.

type.description: Name of the registry to be created of max length of 255, and may only contain letters, numbers, hyphen, underscore, dollar sign, or hash mark.  No whitespace.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: List of tags to tag the Registry

type.description: List of tags to tag the Registry

attributes.description: This resource creates a Registry for authoring schemas as part of Glue Schema Registry.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: Amazon Resource Name for the created Registry.

type.description: Amazon Resource Name for the created Registry.
